g.aria-label: X-axis titled 'percent' for a linear scale with values from 0 to 70

Y-axis for a discrete scale with 6 values: Increase wages offered to existing employees, Increase wages offered to new employees, Increase benefits offered to existing employees, Increase benefits offered to new employees, Provide employees with paid time to engage in learning and development programs, Encourage employees to participate in on-the-job training

g.text: Increase wages offered to existing employees
Increase wages offered to new employees
Increase benefits offered to existing employees
Increase benefits offered to new employees
Provide employees with paid time to engage in learning and development programs
Encourage employees to participate in on-the-job training
